J

jaccardCoefficient(Collection<T>, Collection<T>) - Static method in class util.Similarity
The Jaccard similarity coefficient is the size of the intersection divided by the size of the union of two sets.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class app.Compare
 

P

pseudoCosine(Map<String, Integer>, Map<String, Integer>) - Static method in class util.Similarity
Simulates the cosine metric used in vector-based information-retrieval systems by taking into account the frequency of each element in the sets passed in (as opposed to just their occurrence as in the method Similarity.jaccardCoefficient(Collection, Collection)).

Similarity - Class in util
Calculates the overall similarity between two Twitter users by computing and multiplying together the similarity between various pieces of information: - the Jaccard similarity coefficient between the users each of them is following ("friends") - the Jaccard similarity coefficient between the users that follow each of them ("followers") - the text similarity between their biographies, using an approximation of the cosine distance (see Similarity.pseudoCosine(Map, Map)) - the text similarity between the users they mention (using the same pseudo- cosine distance) - the text similarity between their favorite tweets - the text similarity between their regular tweets * All these individual simlarity scores are given equal weight.
SimilarityResult - Class in util
Wrapper
SimilarityResult() - Constructor for class util.SimilarityResult
 
Stopwords - Class in text
A stop word is a word that should not be used for indexing or similarity calculations.
Stopwords(String) - Constructor for class text.Stopwords
Creates the instance from the contents of a file (one word per line)
Stopwords() - Constructor for class text.Stopwords
No-arg constructor creates an empty list, which can then be added to by the add(String) method.

text - package text
 
tokenize(String) - Method in class text.Tokenizer
Removes punctuation attached to the left or right of each word in the input, as well as stopwords (if defined by the constructor).
tokenize(String) - Method in class text.TwitterTokenizer
Tokenizes the text with the specialized TwitterTokenizer.isWordCharacter(Character) method, then glues the special chacartes back onto the following word.
Tokenizer - Class in text
General-purpose tokenizer using a BreakIterator word instance.
Tokenizer(Stopwords) - Constructor for class text.Tokenizer
Creates a Tokenizer that will remove stopwords from the input text.
toString() - Method in class client.TwitterUser
 
toString() - Method in class util.SimilarityResult
 
TwitterClient - Class in client
Uses the Twitter API to create a client to communicate with the Twitter web service, gather information about users, and return TwitterUser instances containing the information most useful for similarity computations.
TwitterClient(String, String) - Constructor for class client.TwitterClient
Constructs a Twitter API instance.
TwitterTokenizer - Class in text
Extends the general tokenizer by adding @ and # as valid word characters because of their special meaning in Twitter text strings.
TwitterTokenizer(Stopwords) - Constructor for class text.TwitterTokenizer
 
TwitterUser - Class in client
A wrapper around useful data retrieved about a user through the Twitter API.
TwitterUser(String) - Constructor for class client.TwitterUser
Note that this is the only way to set the user's login name.
